participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is practical and grounded, often valuing stability and routine. He is friendly but reserved, appreciating deeper conversations over small talk.
participant_1.background: i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i own a house in florida. i enjoy american sports. i am a male. i have children and dogs.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is adventurous and curious, always eager to explore new ideas and experiences. She is open-minded and enjoys discussing complex topics.
participant_2.background: i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. i am also a graduate student. my parents taught me survival skills.
